articles.title: Blinken shortens SE Asia trip after travelling member tests Covid-19 positive - Malaysiakini
articles.description: This is to mitigate the risk of spreading the coronavirus.
articles.content:
United States Secretary of State Antony J Blinken has cut short his trip to Southeast Asia as a member of the travelling press corps tested positive for Covid-19 after arriving in Malaysia.
